sqlMap.update:
UPDATE YE161060 SET MCUR_HIFE_AMT = #mcurHifeAmt# , MCUR_HIFE_AREA_AMT = #mcurHifeAreaAmt# , MCUR_UI_AMT = #mcurUiAmt#
, ISMT = #ismt# , REVN_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR = #revnAddr#
WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

UPDATE YE161060 SET BRW_LNPB_SRM_AMT = #brwLnpbSrmAmt# , RSDT_LNPB_SRM_AMT = NVL(NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(COMR_PCLTT_AMTFT_AGGR,0)) FROM YE162520 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#),0) + NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(RNTL_CTT_CHRTR_GRNTE_SUM,0)) FROM YE162530 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#),0),0) , LTH_YR15_BLW_ITR_AMT = #lthYr15BlwItrAmt# , LTH_YR29_ITR_AMT = #lthYr29ItrAmt# , LTH_Y30_OVER_ITR_AMT = #lthY30OverItrAmt# , LTH_YR2012_AFTH_Y15_AMT = #lthYr2012AfthY15Amt# , LTH_YR2012_ETC_BRW_ITR_AMT = #lthYr2012EtcBrwItrAmt# , LTH_YR2015_AFTH_FXN_IR_ITR_AMT= #lthYr2015AfthFxnIrItrAmt# , LTH_YR2015_AFTH_Y15_AMT = #lthYr2015AfthY15Amt# , LTH_YR2015_AFTH_ETC_AMT = #lthYr2015AfthEtcAmt# , LTH_YR2015_AFTH_YR15_AMT = #lthYr2015AfthYr15Amt#
, ISMT = #ismt# , REVN_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR = #revnAddr#
WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

, #revnAddr# )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , HTHR_HIFE_AMT , HTHR_HIFE_DDC_AMT , MCUR_HIFE_AMT , MCUR_HIFE_DDC_AMT , HTHR_UI_AMT , HTHR_UI_DDC_AMT , MCUR_UI_AMT , MCUR_UI_DDC_AMT , INFEE_USE_AMT_SUM , INFEE_DDC_AMT_SUM , BRW_LNPB_SRM_AMT , BRW_LNPB_SRM_DDC_AMT , RSDT_LNPB_SRM_AMT , RSDT_LNPB_SRM_DDC_AMT , LTH_YR15_BLW_ITR_AMT , LTH_YR15_BLW_DDC_AMT , LTH_YR29_ITR_AMT , LTH_YR29_DDC_AMT , LTH_Y30_OVER_ITR_AMT , LTH_Y30_OVER_DDC_AMT , LTH_YR2012_AFTH_Y15_AMT , LTH_YR2012_AFTH_Y15_DDC_AMT , LTH_YR2012_ETC_BRW_ITR_AMT , LTH_YR2012_ETC_BRW_DDC_AMT , LTH_YR2015_AFTH_FXN_IR_ITR_AMT , LTH_YR2015_AFTH_FXN_IR_DDC_AMT , LTH_YR2015_AFTH_Y15_AMT , LTH_YR2015_AFTH_Y15_DDC_AMT , LTH_YR2015_AFTH_ETC_AMT , LTH_YR2015_AFTH_ETC_DDC_AMT , LTH_YR2015_AFTH_YR15_AMT , LTH_YR2015_AFTH_YR15_DDC_AMT , HSNG_FNDS_DDC_AMT_SUM , CONB_LGL_USE_AMT , CONB_LGL_DDC_AMT , CONB_RELI_ORG_OTH_USE_AMT , CONB_RELI_ORG_OTH_DDC_AMT , CONB_RELI_ORG_USE_AMT , CONB_RELI_ORG_DDC_AMT , CONB_USE_AMT_SUM , CONB_DDC_AMT_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE161060 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE161060 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
